title: Julian Assange Denied Bail with Stefania Maurizi, Plus Covid Cow Coffins
description:
Disclaimer: this episode was taped early Wednesday, before the events at the Capitol. Investigative reporter Stefania Maurizi joins the show to give an update on the Julian Assange case. Hosts Katie Halper and Matt Taibbi discuss the reconfirmation of Nancy Pelosi as Speaker of the House.
Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
